calendar.noTasksScheduled: No tasks scheduled for this day

calculations.weeklyCapacityFormula: Weekly Capacity = Daily Hours × Working Days per Week
calculations.utilizationTooltip:
{{utilization}}% utilization

Calculation:
• Assigned Hours: {{assignedHours}}h
• Weekly Capacity: {{weeklyCapacity}}h ({{dailyHours}}h × {{workingDays}} days)
• Formula: ({{assignedHours}} ÷ {{weeklyCapacity}}) × 100 = {{utilization}}%
calculations.capacityTooltip:
Weekly Capacity: {{weeklyCapacity}} hours

Based on organization settings:
• Daily Hours: {{dailyHours}}h
• Working Days: {{workingDays}} per week
• Formula: {{dailyHours}}h × {{workingDays}} days = {{weeklyCapacity}}h

statusTooltip.overallocated:
Overallocated (>100% utilization)

This member has more assigned work than their available capacity. Consider redistributing tasks or adjusting capacity.
statusTooltip.underutilized:
Underutilized (<{{threshold}}% utilization)

This member has capacity for additional work. Consider assigning more tasks to optimize resource utilization.
statusTooltip.optimal:
Optimal utilization ({{threshold}}-100%)

This member has a healthy workload balance between assigned tasks and available capacity.

calculations.workingDaysInfo:
Working days based on organization schedule:
{{workingDaysList}}
calculations.averageUtilizationTooltip:
Team Average: {{average}}%

Calculated from {{memberCount}} team members:
• Total Assigned Hours: {{totalAssigned}}h
• Total Team Capacity: {{totalCapacity}}h
• Formula: ({{totalAssigned}} ÷ {{totalCapacity}}) × 100 = {{average}}%
